HECAP never had time to enjoy a normal life outside of work.

YoungMaster70.title: Young master
YoungMaster70.desc:
Born to two medics, NAME longed for power. HISCAP keen intellect and charisma helped HIM gain the respect of HIS peers.
Deciding that the best way to gain power was to climb the ranks of the imperial military, HE joined at the youngest possible age.

ImperialGeneral31.title: Imperial general
ImperialGeneral31.desc:
NAME's thirst for power defined HIM. HECAP quickly rose through the military ranks and soon attained the rank of general.
HECAP was given with the most challenging task - conquering distant and unexplored rim worlds. Victory here could even position HIM as a successor to the emperor.

CaravanTraveler5.title: Caravan traveler
CaravanTraveler5.desc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, NAME was mentored by HIS father in the ways of being a trader. HECAP was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to HIS nomadic lifestyle, HE hunted and bartered for HIS food.

Caravaneer77.title: Caravaneer
Caravaneer77.desc:
NAME was the leader of a caravan. HECAP was responsible for the safety of HIS caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals.
HECAP and HIS people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

FarmersSon51.title: Farmer's son
FarmersSon51.desc:
Ade spent much of his childhood learning biome farming. In his biome they kept animals to investigate which would cope best in the alien environment.
Due to this, the travel restrictions and oxygen rationing system, he rarely got to meet anyone from outside his family.

RebelFighter79.title: Rebel fighter
RebelFighter79.desc:
When civil war broke out Ade remained neutral to either side, until his biome was firebombed by a loyalist militia.
Later, his unit gave him the nickname "Rare" after he burnt down the luxury villa of a loyalist leader, with them still inside it.

WealthyStudent21.title: Wealthy student
WealthyStudent21.desc:
NAME was born on a wealthy glitterworld. HECAP studied at the Caspian school of Engineering, and excelled in mathematics and computer programming.
NAME grew up in clean, sterile environments. HECAP never saw a farm or livestock.

Roboticist20.title: Roboticist
Roboticist20.desc:
NAME felt more comfortable with robots and artificial intelligences than with organic people, so HE worked as a roboticist. HECAP took a particular interest in mechanites and ancient technology.
NAME relied on other people for HIS basic needs.

StreetPeddler62.title: Street peddler
StreetPeddler62.desc:
Growing up on an industrial midworld where robberies and muggings weren't uncommon, NAME helped support his family by making small trinkets and novelties to sell to passers-by.
HECAP learned early on that it wasn't always what HE knew, but who HE knew that would get HIM far in life.

PrivateDetective57.title: Private detective
PrivateDetective57.desc: As a private eye, sharp wits and a silver tongue were NAME's greatest tools. HECAP often spent HIS nights working cases that ranged from uncovering affairs and learning trade secrets to solving murder cases and infiltrating criminal organizations. There wasn't a case HE wouldn't accept for the right price.

BodyguardTrainee27.title: Bodyguard trainee
BodyguardTrainee27.desc:
NAME was born into a famously skilled family of bodyguards. HISCAP mothers Elena and Victoria forced HIM into many dangerous situations, training HIM to put HIS client's well-being over HIS own.
NAME was taught about many herbs and natural poisons to help HIM prevent clients from being poisoned.

SpaceBartender52.title: Space bartender
SpaceBartender52.desc:
NAME became a bartender on a space station. HECAP interacted with and befriended many strangers.
As time went on, NAME used HIS knowledge of herbs to craft HIS own strange concoctions for HIS customers.

SpoiledChild65.title: Spoiled child
SpoiledChild65.desc:
NAME was the child of an industrious space engineer. HISCAP parents forbade most manual and dangerous tasks, so HE learned art and music instead.
HECAP loved animals, but HIS parents never let HIM have a pet - though HE played with other people's pets a lot.

CosmeticSurgeon52.title: Cosmetic surgeon
CosmeticSurgeon52.desc:
NAME had a terrible bedside manner due to HIS abrasiveness. HECAP often bullied HIS patients into getting cosmetic surgery. HECAP made a lot of money this way.
While very studious and careful in HIS work, HE never had to lift a finger doing domestic chores.

Philosopher26.title: Philosopher
Philosopher26.desc:
NAME was a student on a glitterworld. HECAP had a hard time in school, since the other kids thought HIM rather strange.
HECAP always maintained a distance from these events, being continuously surprised by the many interesting and awkward ways life can go.

UprightDiplomat83.title: Upright diplomat
UprightDiplomat83.desc:
As a diplomat, NAME was assigned to deal with diplomatic tasks in the blood-soaked outer rim sectors.
HECAP hoped to end the endless wars, until HIS consularship, the St. Anthem, was attacked by a raider fleet.

CaveChild67.title: Cave child
CaveChild67.desc:
NAME grew up in a cave on an tundra planet, and was adopted by a traveling group of entertainers known only as the Wizards. Once a starfaring crew, the Wizards told HIM wondrous stories about the universe.
One day, the Wizards did not return from scavenging. After years of waiting, NAME set off into space to find them.

VideoProducer97.title: Video producer
VideoProducer97.desc:
Too awkward to socialize, NAME found comfort in the production of videos. Oddly, people enjoyed his videos, calling them "perfect sitcom dramas".
NAME took advantage of this and broadcast more, ever hopeful that HE would be contacted by the Wizards.

RangerChild91.title: Ranger child
RangerChild91.desc:
NAME was raised in a forest. HISCAP father taught HIM to hunt and live off the land, so that HE could live without the need of others when father died.
Accustomed to manual labor and with an intuitive mind, NAME could survive weeks alone.

BushSniper97.title: Bush sniper
BushSniper97.desc:
NAME's peaceful life was cut short when HIS country was brutally invaded.
NAME was drafted into service as soon as HE was of legal age, and quickly showed an aptitude for rifles. HECAP spent months living in the forests picking off soldiers who dared cross the border.

GlitterworldRoyal5.title: Glitterworld royal
GlitterworldRoyal5.desc:
NAME grew up in a glitterworld royal household. She was groomed from a young age to marry into another planet's royal family.
Unfortunately, her crooked teeth made her undesirable to suitors, so she became bitter and resentful.

PirateSympathizer24.title: Pirate sympathizer
PirateSympathizer24.desc:
From her youth, NAME developed connections in the underworld. There she trained in melee combat and became a trusted underworld advisor.
After participating in a failed rebellion, she fled her homeworld to travel with a pirate band.

PlagueSurvivor48.title: Plague survivor
PlagueSurvivor48.desc:
NAME watched as a mysterious plague spread through his town, killing his family and friends.
HECAP learned some medicine from watching the plague doctors, but was mentally scarred by the ordeal.

UnethicalDoctor97.title: Unethical doctor
UnethicalDoctor97.desc:
NAME became a doctor to save lives and research medicine. HECAP soon realized the only way to make progress on HIS research was to perform experiments on human patients.
HECAP often used patients for HIS experiments - whether they were willing or not.

OffworldRecruit22.title: Offworld recruit
OffworldRecruit22.desc:
NAME was born an raised in an offworld soldier growth facility. From a very young age, HE was taught close-quarters combat tactics, aggression, and how to survive on distant planets.
One of the best, NAME was eventually chose to enter the orbital-deployment shock troop corps.

ShockTrooper52.title: Shock trooper
ShockTrooper52.desc:
NAME was in a deep space shock troop unit deployed on multiple planets in various wars.
During a risky assault, HIS whole unit was wiped out. Nobody else knew what happened on the field that day, but NAME will carry the burden forever.

ProdigalStudent39.title: Prodigal student
ProdigalStudent39.desc:
NAME was a faithful student, and was dedicated to learning anything and everything he could about humanity and its creations.
While HE was shunned as a nerd, HE didn't mind. HECAP hoped for a brighter future.

CombatMedtech40.title: Combat medtech
CombatMedtech40.desc:
As a military medtech, NAME's job was to fix and build anything he could get HIS hands on, from living people to machines and mechs.
Sent into dangerous areas, HE never had a problem saving soldiers' lives and building the technology and machines needed to win.

AdventurousYouth32.title: Adventurous youth
AdventurousYouth32.desc:
NAME explored all around HIS family's large estate, uncovering little natural wonders hidden in nearby catacombs, rivers, and caves.
During his teenage years, NAME made numerous enemies

TreasureHunter70.title: Treasure hunter
TreasureHunter70.desc:
NAME explored outer rim planets in hopes of finding rare treasures.
After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, HE was betrayed by HIS men. HECAP survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.
HECAP created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help HIM seek revenge.

PilotFan99.title: Fan d'aviation
PilotFan99.desc:
Le pre de NAME tait un pilote de chasseur spatial, et HE admirait le vieil homme.
Depuis son plus jeune ge, HE collectionnait les souvenirs de pilote et tudiait les livres de pilotage, se prparant rejoindre la marine spatiale et suivre les pas de son pre.

StarfighterPilot54.title: Pilote de chasseur spatial
StarfighterPilot54.desc:
Aprs des annes d'entranements, NAME devint enfin un pilote de chasseur spatial.
Des centaines de missions de combat plus tard, HE s'ennuyait et se mis chercher de nouveaux dfis. HECAP rejoignit alors une bande de pirates de l'espace, qui l'accueillirent bras ouverts pour ses talents de pilote.

MedicalHelper65.title: Medical helper
MedicalHelper65.desc:
NAME traveled between rim worlds with HIS family. NAME's mother, a renowned doctor, often delivered lectures from the hull of their retrofitted cargo/medical ship.
Sometimes, the family took on difficult long-term medical work with especially needy patients, and NAME helped where he could.

GangSoldier28.title: Gang soldier
GangSoldier28.desc:
Living for many years between three raider settlements, NAME persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old man back to health, and many of battles.
HECAP eventually took control of a violent gang.

CountryChild62.title: Country child
CountryChild62.desc: NAME was raised up to fear God and love HIS country. HECAP was a genuine backwoods kid. HECAP always worked hard to earn respect rather than demanding it.

SpaceMarine80.title: Space marine
SpaceMarine80.desc:
NAME joined Interplanetary Marines to travel the stars fight for HIS planet. HECAP distinguished himself in several battles.
HISCAP experiences desensitized him to people around him, and his social skills degraded. But, he did learn how to fight.

RebelWriter82.title: Rebel writer
RebelWriter82.desc: Early on, NAME developed a talent for writing. HECAP was soon writing a popular online journal - anonymously, to hide HIS age - on topics ranging from bioethics to political theory and xenosociology.

Adventurer17.title: Adventurer
Adventurer17.desc:
NAME's thirst for adventure took HIM to many planets. HECAP visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in HIS quest to find novelty and excitement.
HECAP worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck. Among all jobs, HE hated cooking the most.

ExiledPrince89.title: Exiled prince
ExiledPrince89.desc:
A member of a royal family, NAME was exiled for shaming HIS family.
Living in a foreign land, mostly alone, HE spent most of HIS time making huts and houses to live in. HECAP found little time in an average day for enjoyment, and lost all his friends and family.

BloodyWanderer51.title: Bloody wanderer
BloodyWanderer51.desc:
NAME was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.
One day, he had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. HECAP eventually calmed, but HIS bloodlust never left HIM.

NewAgeDuelist36.title: New age duelist
NewAgeDuelist36.desc:
NAME was fascinated with combat. HIS parents traveled often, so HE was able to sample many different fighting styles, from 76th-wave jujutsu to the infamous 'urbworld-style' karate.
A polite child, most fighters accepted HIS requests for training - but moving around often without finishing a tutelage made HIM lazy.

PirateDoctor33.title: Pirate doctor
PirateDoctor33.desc:
NAME had a passion for medicine, but never bothered to get a medical degree. Only underfunded pirates and terrorists were desperate enough to hire HIS services, and HIS surgical patients had about a 50% survival rate.
Despite this, HIS optimistic attitude drove HIM to keep trying to heal those in need. As long as they paid up front.

SpoiledBrat84.title: Spoiled brat
SpoiledBrat84.desc:
Born in a rich family, NAME was given everything, and never developed basic work ethic or the foundations of a non-dependent personality.
HECAP was expected to become one of the best doctors in the world.

BloodyDentist33.title: Bloody dentist
BloodyDentist33.desc:
After studying at a famous college, NAME's weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. HECAP went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under HIS care.
After a pursuit, HE managed to escape HIS planet and travel to a new world.

CowFarmer93.title: Cow farmer
CowFarmer93.desc:
NAME grew up on a rim world, under the tyranny of HIS father, who forced HIM to work every day on the farm. HE dreamed of escaping HIS father and exploring the universe.
One day, when the trade ship was overhead, HE stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

MasterChef6.title: Master chef
MasterChef6.desc:
On a glitterworld, NAME found a job washing dishes at a famous restaurant and worked HIS way up the ranks.
A few years later, HIS career came to an end when someone poisoned the meal HE was preparing for the mayor. Jobless, HE and left to explore the stars once again.

DiscardedYouth95.title: Discarded youth
DiscardedYouth95.desc:
NAME grew up isolated on a trash planet. A dumping ground for surrounding glitterworlds, it was a harsh home. As a baby, HE sucked on the tap of a discarded nutrient paste dispenser for comfort.
In these desperate circumstances, against all odds, HE survived - and thrived.

Mercenary19.title: Mercenary
Mercenary19.desc:
After escaping his home planet, NAME fell in with a band of mercenaries. HECAP fought alongside his brothers and sisters in arms for many years.
One day, they were caught in a fight they couldn't win. Refusing to retreat, NAME was shot down by his enemies. HECAP was alarmed to awake in a heap of corpses, mysteriously unharmed.

DisasterSurvivor28.title: Disaster survivor
DisasterSurvivor28.desc: NAME's planet collided with a small moon. Everything he knew as home was destroyed, and his entire family died. HECAP was left in the ruins to fend for himself.

ExplorerWriter37.title: Explorer-writer
ExplorerWriter37.desc:
NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research.
HISCAP goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

RebelChild7.title: Rebel child
RebelChild7.desc:
NAME was born under authoritarian rule. Despite intense oppression from family and community, she never gave up fighting for her dignity and her freedom.
She was often put into hopeless situations where even family would try to terrorize her into propriety. She learned to trust no one.

MilitiaSoldier83.title: Militia soldier
MilitiaSoldier83.desc:
NAME joined the militia forces and fought for rights and peace.
After her homeworld was unexpectedly destroyed in the wars, she traveled great distances, seeking a refuge where she could build a new, free way of life.

MidworldCadet20.title: Midworld cadet
MidworldCadet20.desc:
Growing up on a high-tech midworld with a flourishing space transit industry, NAME wished to leave for the stars and live among the growing spacer class.
HECAP excelled in HIS studies, and gained entry to HIS homeworld's most prestigious naval academy.

WarshipCaptain77.title: Warship captain
WarshipCaptain77.desc:
Years of being commanding officer of an advanced corvette taught NAME the art of leadership, the techniques of higher engineering, and how to stay calm while enemies try to kill you.
Unfortunately, NAME only very rarely had contact with nature.

Punk70.title: Punk
Punk70.desc: NAME spent his childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.

GameDeveloper59.title: Game developer
GameDeveloper59.desc:
NAME was an independent game developer.
After an early success, NAME's career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.
